info.name: Restaurant Menu API - Complete Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the Restaurant Menu API. This collection includes all CRUD endpoints with descriptions, example requests/responses, and automated tests.

item.name: GET Endpoints
item.description: Retrieve menu items from the API

description.content:
Retrieve all menu items from the restaurant.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/menu`

**Use Case:** Display the complete menu to customers

**Response:** Array of menu item objects with all details (id, name, description, price, category, ingredients, availability)

response.name: Successful GET - All menu items
response.body:
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Classic Burger",
    "description": "Beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on a sesame seed bun",
    "price": 12.99,
    "category": "entree",
    "ingredients": ["beef", "lettuce", "tomato", "cheese", "bun"],
    "available": true
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Chicken Caesar Salad",
    "description": "Grilled chicken breast over romaine lettuce with parmesan and croutons",
    "price": 11.50,
    "category": "entree",
    "ingredients": ["chicken", "romaine lettuce", "parmesan cheese", "croutons", "caesar dressing"],
    "available": true
  }
]

description.content:
Retrieve a specific menu item by its ID.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/menu/:id`

**Parameters:**
- `id` (path) - The unique identifier of the menu item

**Use Case:** Display details of a single menu item

**Success Response:** Object containing the menu item details

**Error Cases:**
- 404: Menu item not found (invalid ID)

response.name: Successful GET - Menu item by ID
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Classic Burger",
  "description": "Beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on a sesame seed bun",
  "price": 12.99,
  "category": "entree",
  "ingredients": ["beef", "lettuce", "tomato", "cheese", "bun"],
  "available": true
}

description.content:
Add a new menu item to the restaurant's menu.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/menu`

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "name": "string (required)",
  "description": "string (optional)",
  "price": "number (required, must be > 0)",
  "category": "string (optional)",
  "ingredients": "array (optional)",
  "available": "boolean (optional, default: true)"
}
```

**Validation Rules:**
- `name` is required and must be a non-empty string
- `price` is required and must be a positive number
- All other fields are optional

**Success Response (201):** Created menu item object with auto-generated `id`

**Error Cases:**
- 400: Validation error (missing required fields or invalid types)

description.content:
Update one or more fields of an existing menu item.

**Endpoint:** `PUT /api/menu/:id`

**Parameters:**
- `id` (path) - The unique identifier of the menu item to update

**Request Body:** (all fields optional)
```json
{
  "name": "string (optional)",
  "description": "string (optional)",
  "price": "number (optional, must be > 0)",
  "category": "string (optional)",
  "ingredients": "array (optional)",
  "available": "boolean (optional)"
}
```

**Validation Rules:**
- If `name` is provided, it must be a non-empty string
- If `price` is provided, it must be a positive number
- Only provided fields are updated (partial updates supported)

**Success Response (200):** Updated menu item object

**Error Cases:**
- 400: Validation error (invalid field types or values)
- 404: Menu item not found (invalid ID)

response.name: Successful PUT - Update menu item
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Classic Burger",

  "price": 14.99,
  "category": "entree",

  "available": false
}

description.content:
Remove a menu item from the restaurant's menu permanently.

**Endpoint:** `DELETE /api/menu/:id`

**Parameters:**
- `id` (path) - The unique identifier of the menu item to delete

**Use Case:** Remove items from the menu (e.g., seasonal items, discontinued products)

**Success Response (200):** Confirmation message

**Error Cases:**
- 404: Menu item not found (invalid ID)

**Notes:**
- This action is irreversible
- Deleted items cannot be recovered
